name: super silly adele adventure!
description:
ADELE SUPER SILLY ADVENTURE hii!! im adele and just managed to create a "visual novel" in a day its short and tw kinda for a creepy pic! adele is my oc and i like her v much, this is not totally an accuerate depiction but still!!
i want to make more of these, of my ocs!!

i would really appreciate some advice on using renpy btw..
